description:
Protect your skin from UV rays with non-nano zinc oxide and soothe with antioxidant rich ingredients. Reef friendly SPF 30 formula is non-oily, and easy to apply.Water resistant for 80 minutes.Not animal tested.Plant-based, natural and non-toxic.Free of parabens, phthalates and artificial colors.Ingredients: Ashwagandha, Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea extract.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Salt and Stone SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion - Unisex
